DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center Phase 3 trial include randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , treatment phase evaluate efficacy safety 2 dose oral AQX-1125 600 subject interstitial cystitis/bladder pain syndrome . The primary objective study evaluate effect 12 week treatment AQX-1125 ( 100 mg 200 mg ) administer daily compare placebo change Baseline Week 12 maximum daily bladder pain use standardize 11-point numerical rating scale pain score record daily electronic diary ( e-diary ) . The 12-week Treatment Period follow Extension Period 40 week . Randomization start dose occurs Baseline follow visit Week 6 Week 12 . At end Week 12 , subject randomize 40-week Extension Period . Subjects active treatment Treatment Period continue dose Extension Period , subject receive placebo Treatment Period randomize one active dose 100 mg 200 mg AQX-1125 40 week .
